modName: Dracos Powerful Artifacts daggers rings amulet
summary:
Draco\'s Powerful Artifact\'s Mod

This Mod is meant for really hard difficulty mods to help your character live. It is over powered for the normal game.

(See Pictures for Details)
1-Amulet 
8-Rings 
2-Daggers
All are disenchant able and craft able at forges.
descriptionHtml:
Draco\'s Powerful Artifact\'s Mod 1.4 Latest Version. 

1.4 Nerfed the Enchants some and made them Unable to Disenchant. More of a hardcore version can only be crafted as well now. Added ring of Priest.

1.3 Update added two new rings shadow and mule. Rebalanced enchants so you can disenchant rings to make stronger rings. un-equip rings before you install update.

This Mod is meant for really hard difficulty mods to help your character live. It is over powered for the normal game.

(See Pictures for Details)
1-Amulet 
11-Rings 
2-Daggers

Craft able at forges. 

Removed the cheat barrel in riverwood in version 1.4.


Install:

1.Unzip
2.copy folder to skyrim folder data folder

Nexus manager should work due the way this is packed. Let me know if not.

Hope you all enjoy.

[color=yellow][u][b]My other mods[/b][/u][/color]
[color=yellow][u][b]Draco1122[/b][/u][/color]
